name: Rogue - A UI kit inspired by The Division universe
description:
For my first contribution on the Figma community, i wanted to share with everyone some UI element i did for my personal portfolio. Being a big fan of the game i tried to recreate the style as close as possible.


Hope you like this. If you do please drop a like, share it, or contribute with a remix.

Follow me on twitter @jon_dury for bug and suggestions.


CHANGELOG

2021/06/29

  • Added some background textures
  • Added some new titles using background texture
  • Added some examples (loader screen & presentation cover)

2021/06/27

  • Added color system
  • Added the official game typography and free alterntatives from google fonts
  • Added some UI elements (cursors, loaders, circle visual element, base card)
  • Added some typography composition


PLANNED ADDITION

  • Example page
  • More documentation
  • Typography system and additional tokens
  • More UI elements like CTA and forms elements
